actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1071 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the nonrecognition of gain to certain sales which effectuate or implement the policies of the Federal Communications Commission.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for a deferral of taxable gains from the sale of property (including stock) used in an activity licensed or regulated by the Federal Communications Commission if, within 12 months after the sale, the taxpayer acquired property that the Commission certifies to be necessary or appropriate to implement a Commission policy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1071 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the nonrecognition of gain to certain sales which effectuate or implement the policies of the Federal Communications Commission.
